title: Windows 8.1 + languagepacks + perm activation method. [TDM]
description:
]Mount or burn .ISO, or use win 7 usb/dvd tool to make a bootable USB.

Use this key for install:

XHQ8N-C3MCJ-RQXB6-WCHYG-C9WKB

Install as normal OS installation.
After installation, disconnect from internet and use commandprompt to uninstall productkey (slmgr -upk).

Read the install instructions provided to permanently activate your copy of Windows 8.1 RTM!
